text: Herring Networks Inc. is a San Diego, California, based media company. It was founded in 2003 by Robert "Red" Herring. Through its Herring Broadcasting division; the company owns and operates two cable networks: AWE Network (originally known as Wealth TV), an American lifestyle and entertainment cable network founded in 2004, and the conservative One America News Network (OAN or OANN), a strategic partnership with The Washington TimesUSA Today: Herring to launch conservative news channel launched in 2013. Herring is a self-described insomniac, who spent nights watching TV, eventually deciding to enter into the news business. His son, Charles, the company president, describes the elder Herring as a "news junkie". ==References== Category:Companies based in San Diego Category:2004 establishments in California Category:American companies established in 2004 Category:Cable television companies of the United States Category:American Broadcasting Company
title: Herring Networks
